column4: I only have one question I didn't find in the faq: does ubuntu come with prelink ?
no, we use a linker option which gets you most of the benefits of prelink without the management pain
mmmm, interesting, where can I find information about that option?
it's -O1, look it up in the ld documentation
by the way, is "capital o", right?
is not in the man page
-O is in the man page, but it doesn't go into detail
that seems like the global optimizator, doesn't it ?
